output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in finishDistribution function allows the owner to finish the distribution of the tokens.
Integer overflow in distr function allows the owner to distribute a specific amount of the total supply of the tokens.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows the owner to transfer a specific amount of the total supply of the tokens.
Integer overflow in approve function allows the owner to set the allowance of a specific user.
Integer overflow in getTokens function allows the owner to retrieve a specific amount of the total supply of the tokens.
Integer overflow in burn function allows the owner to burn a specific amount of the total supply of the tokens.
Integer overflow in withdrawForeignTokens function allows the owner to transfer a specific amount of foreign tokens.
Integer overflow in burnFrom function allows the owner to burn a specific amount of the total supply of the tokens.
Integer overflow in finalizeDistribution function allows the owner to finish the distribution of the tokens.
Integer overflow in createInvestor function allows the owner to create a specific user.
Integer overflow in whitelist function allows the owner to create a specific whitelist.
